original_text: And king Ahaz cut off the borders of the bases, and removed the laver from off them; and took down the sea from off the brasen oxen that were under it, and put it upon the pavement of stones.
korean_text: 아하스 왕이 물두멍 받침의 옆판을 떼내고 물두멍을 그 자리에서 옮기고 또 놋바다를 놋소 위에서 내려다가 돌판 위에 그것을 두며

sentences.original_text: And king Ahaz cut off the borders of the bases
and removed the laver from off them
and took down the sea from off the brasen oxen
sentences.korean_translation: 그것 밑에 있던 놋쇠 소들로부터 바다를 내렸고

sentences.original_text: and put it upon the pavement of stones
